translations: vt.写神话；当做神话；把……解释为神话

phrs.translation: 写神话, 当做神话, 讲神话

sentences.sentence: It has always been tempting for humans to mythologize snakes.
sentences.translation: 写有关蛇的神话是令人感兴趣的。

sentences.sentence: I think, in part, we mythologize sacrifice, ennoble it with layer upon layer of redemptive they-did-not-suffer-and-die-in-vain meaning, because it enables us to bear the pain of loss.
sentences.translation: 我想，我们神话牺牲者，给他们批上一层救赎的外衣，认为他们的苦难和死亡并非毫无意义而更显尊贵，在某种程度上只是为了让我们能承受失去他们的痛苦。
